mapper.insert: insert into member(id, email, pwd, nick_name, member_img) values (#{id}, #{email}, #{pwd}, #{nickName}, #{memberImg})
mapper.select: select count(mno) from member where del_at is null
select count(id) from member where id = #{id}
select count(nick_name) from member where nick_name = #{nickName}
select count(email) from member where email = #{email}
mapper.update: update member set mno = #{mno}, id = #{id}, pwd = #{pwd}, nick_name = #{nickName}, grade = #{grade}, report_count = #{reportCount}, member_img = #{memberImg} where mno = #{mno}
